author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Okay, you caught me, I admit it: haunted house stories are my guilty pleasure reads. There, I said it. They are my equivalent of a comfort read. Once in a while, I’m treated to a little bonus when an author tries something different and Cherie Priest’s upcoming title It Was Her House First falls into […]

The post REVIEW: It Was Her House First by Cherie Priest appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: It Was Her House First by Cherie Priest
